```lisp
[
    (:action cut ; Cut an item to transform its state
     :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?new_item - object)
     :precondition (and (inventory ?npc ?item) (not (inventory ?npc ?new_item)))
     :effect (and (inventory ?npc ?new_item) (not (inventory ?npc ?item)))),
    
    (:action squeeze ; General action for squeezing or using lemons on objects
     :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?location - location ?resource - resource)
     :precondition (and 
         (inventory ?npc ?item) 
         (or 
             (and (at ?npc ?location) (type ?item lemon_half))
             (and (type ?item lemon) (not (inventory ?npc ?resource)))
         )
     )
     :effect (and 
         (or 
             (and (type ?item lemon) (inventory ?npc ?resource) (not (inventory ?npc ?item)))
         )
     )
    )
]
```

### Corrections Made:
1. Standardized variable types: Changed `?npc` type from `npc` to `person` for consistency.
2. Closed the `:effect` section for the `squeeze` action with a parenthesis.
3. Ensured logical consistency in preconditions and effects without adding unnecessary conditions.
